refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: data = mdaq_mem_get(start, size, vectorSize) data = mdaq_mem_get(linkID, start, size, vectorSize)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function download data written by 'MEM Write' block. It gives possibility to download data from Standalone application generated from XCos diagram. In order to download data function parameters start_index and vector size needs to be the same as defined in 'MEM Write' block in XCos diagram.

listitem.para: size: Data size to be downloaded

refsection.title: Examples
